comments.html: Subscriber should also take into account recent End-of-Life Announcement from Cisco about Nexus 93180YC-EX models. Replacement product is N9K-C93180YC-FX3 which has also 1200 Mpps forwarding rate. That should be sufficient for most environments.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Last month, I made a lab test with FX version using Spirent with 48x25Gbps. We got a maximum of ~68% of throughput without loss. If I’m not wrong, it represents almost 1600 Mpps. About the main focus of the blog post, I agree that the requirements are so important to spend money properly according to the project. 😅
comments.name: Adeilson Rateiro
